actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the city of Umatilla and to the port of Umatilla certain real property in Umatilla County, Oregon.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to the city and port of Umatilla, Oregon, without consideration, specified lands and improvements in Umatilla County, Oregon. Reserves to the United States the perpetual right and easement over such lands and improvements. Sets forth other conditions and terms of such conveyance, including compliance with the provisions of the National Historic Preservation Act and the National Environmental Policy Act. Reserves to the United States the right to construct and operate navigation markers, water gauging stations, communications and other necessary facilities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the city of Umatilla and to the port of Umatilla certain real property in Umatilla County, Oregon.
